results.title: Just one of the boys
results.creator_credit: Christina Crowley, Association Films and O D N Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Acquaintance Rape”.
Demonstrates the occurrence of sexual assaults between teenage acquaintances through an episode involving a teenage boy whose desire to be accepted as one of the boys call for participation in a gang rape. Points out various factors which contribute to the assault situation, and emphasises the need for young people to undertstand their own sexual values and those of others.

results.title: The Party game
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Acquaintance Rape”.
Dramatizes the occurrence of sexual assault between teenage acquaintances through an episode involving a teenage girl and the intimate advances of her dancing partner. Points out various factors which contribute to the dancing partner’s sexual assault, and emphasises the need for young people to understand their own sexual values and those of others.

results.title: End of the Road
results.creator_credit: Christina Crowley and O D N Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Acquaintance Rape”.
This film dramatises the occurrence of sexual assault between teenage acquaintances through an episode involving a teenage girl, who accepts a ride offered by an acquaintance after her car breaks down. This film points out various factors which contribute to the driver’s sexual assault, and emphasises the need for young people to understand their own sexual values and those of others. Written by Nancy Graham and Christina Crowley

results.title: The Date
results.creator_credit: Christina Crowley and O D N Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Acquaintance Rape”.
A young girl with an older boy come home after a date. They play out what they think of each other in their minds. The young man wants to go to bed with her, while she’s thinking about what a nice guy he is. She rejects him when he makes a pass at her. They argue, he slaps her and begins to harass her. The film stops there providing food for thought on the subject of sexual violence/sexual harassment.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Christina Crowley and O D N Productions

results.title: About Animals
results.media_note: Sorry, we don't have images or video for this item.

results.title: Guinea pigs
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “About Animals”.
Children learn that guinea pigs are affectionate animals who seem to like being with people and are easy to care for and handle. Basic facts about selective breeding are introduced as the children observe the varied colourings and markings of guinea pigs.
